pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可补偿的；应予以补偿的

word_group.brief_definition: 为补偿...；为弥补...；用于补偿...

bilingual.source: Nothing can compensate for the loss of a loved one.
bilingual.target: 失去亲人的痛苦是无法补偿的。

bilingual.source: He gave her a gift to compensate for her disappointment.
bilingual.target: 他用礼物来补偿她的失望。

bilingual.source: The insurance company will compensate you for your loss.
bilingual.target: 保险公司将补偿你的损失。

bilingual.source: The company will compensate you for any travel expenses.
bilingual.target: 公司会补偿你所有的差旅费用。

bilingual.source: The insurance policy will compensate you for any losses.
bilingual.target: 保险政策会补偿你所有的损失。

bilingual.source: She worked hard to compensate for her lack of experience.
bilingual.target: 她努力工作以补偿她的缺乏经验。

bilingual.source: The company decided to compensate employees for their overtime.
bilingual.target: 公司决定补偿员工的加班时间。

bilingual.source: They offered to compensate him for the damage to his car.
bilingual.target: 他们提出要补偿他汽车的损坏。

bilingual.source: We will compensate you for the inconvenience caused by the delay.
bilingual.target: 我们将补偿你因延误而造成的不便。

bilingual.source: She tries to compensate for her lack of experience with hard work.
bilingual.target: 她试图通过努力工作来补偿经验的不足。

list.abstract: compensate（英[ˈkɒmpenseɪt]，美[ˈkɑːmpenseɪt]），英语单词，动词，意思为补偿；赔偿；弥补。短语搭配有compensate for（为补偿...）。例句为“It forces the customer to compensate the waiter.（它迫使顾客赔偿服务员。）” compensate相关近义词有make good、to make up for等，相关反义词有wrong。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, which means they'll lose face and compensate by increasing their ground presence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那他们就会丢面子，进而增加派军来挽回这个面子。

yingyinNormal.en: They have Twizzlers instead of Red Vines. No amount of lumbar support can compensate for that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它们只有Twizzlers没有Red Vines[糖果品牌]，无论多好的腰椎支撑都是无法弥补的。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know. Maybe maybe low self-esteem, maybe to compensate for overshadowing a sibling, maybe you...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不知道，或许自信心不足，或许是弥补你让你妹相形见绌的愧疚。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Work by Tina Malti, a psychology professor at the University of Toronto, suggests that guilt may <highlight>compensate</highlight> for an emotional deficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多伦多大学心理学教授Tina Malti的研究表明，内疚可能会补偿情感缺失。

examination_example.sentence: The fund will also be used to <highlight>compensate</highlight> landowners who set aside habitat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该基金也会被用于补偿那些休耕栖息地的土地所有者。

sense_info_list.en: to pay sb money because they have suffered some damage, loss, injury, etc.

word_usage.usage:
compensate既可作及物动词，compensate sb. for sth. 表示“向某人补偿某物”，如：
We must compensate him for the time he spent in helping us. 
我们必须补偿他帮助我们所花费的时间。
也可作不及物动词，用compensate for sth. 表示“补偿某物”，如：  
Nothing can compensate for the loss of a loved one. 
失去心爱的人是无法补偿的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 补偿物；赔偿物；补偿；工资；代偿；弥补；抵消；补偿行为；赔偿行为；薪水

word_family.mean: v. 补偿；赔偿；弥补；抵消；平衡；校正；酬报；隐藏；弥补（无能

sense_info_list.en: make up for something unwelcome or unpleasant by exerting an opposite force or effect

examination_example.sentence: Most of the respondents got <highlight>compensated</highlight> for driving 384 miles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数受访者因驾驶384英里获得了补偿。

examination_example.sentence: Picture this scenario：You often drive for work and can be <highlight>compensated</highlight> for up to 400 miles per month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想象一下这样的情景：你经常开车上班，每月最多可以得到400英里的补偿。

examination_example.sentence: When students were reminded of a time they had been excluded in a social setting, they <highlight>compensated</highlight> by exaggerating their number of friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当学生想起曾经被社团排斥的时候，他们通过夸大朋友数量来弥补这一点。

examination_example.sentence: Even if they get online traffic, they struggle to make enough money online to <highlight>compensate</highlight> for what they are losing offline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使他们获得了在线流量，他们也很难在网上赚到足够的钱来弥补线下的损失。

sense_info_list.en: give someone something, typically money, in recognition of loss, suffering, or injury incurred

examination_example.sentence: For this scheme to work, the government must provide wage subsidies to <highlight>compensate</highlight> for lost pay due to the shorter hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了使这项计划发挥作用，政府必须提供工资补贴，以补偿因工时缩短而损失的工资。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指弥补过错或赎罪, 常用搭配： atone for...。
指因使他人受到伤害、损失等而给予赔偿, 也指对某事的不良影响进行弥补, 常用搭配： compensate for...。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 补偿物；赔偿物；补偿；工资；代偿；弥补；抵消；补偿行为；赔偿行为；薪水

word_family.mean: v. 补偿；赔偿；弥补；抵消；平衡；校正；酬报；隐藏；弥补（无能

sense_info_list.en: give someone something; typically money; in recognition of loss; suffering; or injury incurred

examination_example.sentence: Unless employees are fully <highlight>compensated</highlight>, this could become a variant of parasitic (寄生的) capitalism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非员工得到充分补偿，否则这可能成为一种寄生资本主义。

examination_example.sentence: However, visitors will be <highlight>compensated</highlight> during the closure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，游客将在关闭期间得到补偿。

examination_example.sentence: It forces the customer to <highlight>compensate</highlight> the waiter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它迫使顾客赔偿服务员。

sense_info_list.en: make up for something unwelcome or unpleasant by exerting an opposite force or effect

examination_example.sentence: The lack of knowledge is difficult if not impossible to <highlight>compensate</highlight> for later on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 知识的缺乏很难甚至不可能在以后得到弥补。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
